textAfterTable: View only items available in your size microfiber: 82% nylon, 18% lycra; lace: 82% nylon, 18% spandex Hand Wash Made in Columbia Spacer technology gives you slight padding while still being able to fold down to nurse This is a very beautiful bra but I would describe it more as lined than padded. I was looking for a padded nursing bra to hide nipple show-through and breast pads so unfortunately I had to return this as it was not thick enough to prevent show-through. Reviewed by J. R.
